title: The Baker and the Beauty
overview: Baker and the Beauty is the story of a super model Aira and a very poor baker Vijju. Both are in constant search for true love. Because of their overwhelming class, caste, religious, economic and social differences, this relationship almost becomes impossible at any given time. On top of that, Aira & Vijju are constantly being separated by Vijju’s obsessive girlfriend and Aira’s overprotective manager. By the end, how Aira & Vijju navigate these obstacles to discover their true love forms the crux of the main plot.
